FuncDef: The display lldp mdn local command displays configurations and status information about MAC address discovery neighbor (MDN) on a specific or all interfaces. The display lldp mdn local command displays configurations and status information about MAC address discovery neighbor (MDN) on a specific or all interfaces.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays MDN information about a specified interface.
If this parameter is not specified, MDN information about all interfaces is displayed.
Displays configuration and status information about MDN on a specified interface.
If this parameter is not specified, configurations and status information about MDN on all interfaces are displayed.
-

ExtraInfo: To view configurations and status information about MDN on a specific or all interfaces, run the display lldp mdn local command.
